text: Regina McCarthy (born May 3, 1954) is an American environmental health and air quality expert. She was the 13th Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) from 2013 to 2017. On December 17, 2020, Joe Biden announced that he would be nominating McCarthy as the first National Climate Advisor. In September 2022, McCarthy announced her resignation as Climate Change advisor. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Administrators of the United States Environmental Protection Agency Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Businesspeople from Boston Category:American environmentalists Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:Businesspeople from Connecticut
title: Gina McCarthy
